MemberSignature.Usage: new Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataLake.Analytics.Models.CreateScopeJobParameters (type, properties, name, degreeOfParallelism, priority, logFilePatterns, related, tags)

Docs.param: The job type of the current job (Hive, USql, or Scope (for internal use only)). Possible values include: 'USql', 'Hive', 'Scope'
The friendly name of the job to submit.
The degree of parallelism to use for this job. This must be greater than 0, if set to less than 0 it will default to 1.
The priority value to use for the current job. Lower numbers have a higher priority. By default, a job has a priority of 1000. This must be greater than 0.
The list of log file name patterns to find in the logFolder. '*' is the only matching character allowed. Example format: jobExecution*.log or *mylog*.txt
The recurring job relationship information properties.
The key-value pairs used to add additional metadata to the job information.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the CreateScopeJobParameters class.
